trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-Module
trans-unit.target: Get-Module

trans-unit.source: Get-Module
trans-unit.target: Get-Module

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets the modules that have been imported or that can be imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 获取已导入或可导入到当前会话的模块。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Loaded (Default)
trans-unit.target: 加载 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: CimSession
trans-unit.target: CimSession

trans-unit.source: Available
trans-unit.target: 可用

trans-unit.source: PsSession
trans-unit.target: PsSession

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Module** cmdlet gets the Windows PowerShell modules that have been imported, or that can be imported, into a Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** cmdlet 可获取的已导入，或者，可以导入的 Windows PowerShell 会话的 Windows PowerShell 模块。

trans-unit.source: The module object that **Get-Module** returns contains valuable information about the module.
trans-unit.target: 模块对象 **Get-module** 返回包含有关该模块的重要信息。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe the module objects to other cmdlets, such as the Import-Module and Remove-Module cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道将模块对象传送到其他 cmdlet，如导入模块和删除模块 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, **Get-Module** gets modules that have been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 不带参数， **Get-module** 获取已导入到当前会话的模块。

trans-unit.source: To get all installed modules, specify the *ListAvailable* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取所有已安装的模块，请指定 *ListAvailable* 参数。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Module** gets modules, but it does not import them.
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** 获取模块，但它不导入它们。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, modules are automatically imported when you use a command in the module, but a **Get-Module** command does not trigger an automatic import.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，模块会自动导入的模块中使用命令时，但 **Get-module** 命令不会触发自动导入。

trans-unit.source: You can also import the modules into your session by using the **Import-Module** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以导入模块到你的会话使用 **导入模块** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, you can get and then, import modules from remote sessions into the local session.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，可以获取，然后，导入到本地会话的远程会话的模块。

trans-unit.source: This strategy uses the Implicit Remoting feature of Windows PowerShell and is equivalent to using the Import-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此策略使用 Windows PowerShell 的隐式远程处理功能，并等效于使用 Import-pssession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: When you use commands in modules imported from another session, the commands run implicitly in the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 如果在从另一个会话导入的模块中使用的命令，命令在远程会话中隐式运行。

trans-unit.source: This feature lets you manage the remote computer from the local session.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许你通过本地会话管理远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: Also, starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, you can use **Get-Module** and **Import-Module** to get and import Common Information Model (CIM) modules, in which the cmdlets are defined in Cmdlet Definition XML (CDXML) files.
trans-unit.target: 此外，从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，您可以使用 **Get-module** 和 **导入模块** 获取和导入通用信息模型 (CIM) 模块，这些 cmdlet 在 Cmdlet 定义 XML (CDXML) 文件中在其中的定义。

trans-unit.source: This feature lets you use cmdlets that are implemented in non-managed code assemblies, such as those written in C++.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许您使用在非托管代码程序集，如在 c + + 编写的那些中实现的 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: With these new features, the **Get-Module** and **Import-Module** cmdlets become primary tools for managing heterogeneous enterprises that include computers that run the Windows operating system and computers that run other operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 借助这些新功能， **Get-module** 和 **导入模块** cmdlet 成为主要的工具，包括运行 Windows 操作系统和计算机的计算机的管理不同企业运行其他操作系统的系统。

trans-unit.source: To manage remote computers that run the Windows operating system that have Windows PowerShell and Windows PowerShell remoting enabled, create a **PSSession** on the remote computer and then use the *PSSession* parameter of **Get-Module** to get the Windows PowerShell modules in the **PSSession**.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理具有远程计算机运行 Windows 操作系统的 Windows PowerShell 和启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理，创建 **PSSession** 在远程计算机，然后使用 *PSSession* 参数 **Get-module** 来获取 Windows PowerShell 模块中 **PSSession**。

trans-unit.source: When you import the modules, and then use the imported commands in the current session, the commands run implicitly in the **PSSession** on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在导入模块，并在当前会话中使用导入的命令，命令运行隐式在 **PSSession** 远程计算机上。

trans-unit.source: You can use this strategy to manage the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此策略用于管理远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: You can use a similar strategy to manage computers that do not have Windows PowerShell remoting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用类似的策略来管理未启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理的计算机。

trans-unit.source: These include computers that are not running the Windows operating system, and computers that have Windows PowerShell but do not have Windows PowerShell remoting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括未运行 Windows 操作系统的计算机以及具有 Windows PowerShell 但未启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Start by creating a CIM session on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 从远程计算机上创建 CIM 会话开始。

trans-unit.source: A CIM session is a connection to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: CIM 会话是远程计算机上的连接到 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)。

trans-unit.source: Then use the *CIMSession* parameter of **Get-Module** to get CIM modules from the CIM session.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用 *CIMSession* 参数 **Get-module** 从 CIM 会话获取 CIM 模块。

trans-unit.source: When you import a CIM module by using the **Import-Module** cmdlet and then run the imported commands, the commands run implicitly on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用导入 CIM 模块 **导入模块** cmdlet 并运行导入的命令，这些命令在远程计算机隐式运行。

trans-unit.source: You can use this WMI and CIM strategy to manage the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此 WMI 和 CIM 策略用于管理远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get modules imported into the current session
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 获取导入到当前会话的模块

trans-unit.source: This command gets modules that have been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取已导入当前会话的模块。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get installed modules and available modules
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 获取已安装的模块和可用的模块

trans-unit.source: This command gets the modules that are installed on the computer and can be imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取已安装在计算机上的且可导入当前会话的模块。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Module** looks for available modules in the path specified by the **$env:PSModulePath** environment variable.
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** 查找可用模块中指定的路径 **$env: PSModulePath** 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: For more information about **PSModulePath**, see about_Modules and about_Environment_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息 **PSModulePath**, ，请参阅 about_Modules 和 about_Environment_Variables。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get all exported files
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 获取所有导出的文件

trans-unit.source: This command gets all of the exported files for all available modules.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取所有可用模块的所有导出的文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get a module by its fully qualified name
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 通过其完全限定名获取模块

trans-unit.source: This command gets the **Microsoft.PowerShell.Management** module by specifying the fully qualified name of the module by using the *FullyQualifiedName* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Management** 通过使用指定的模块的完全限定的名称的模块 *FullyQualifiedName* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The command then pipes the results into the Format-Table cmdlet to format the results as a table with Name and Version as the column headings.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该命令管道将结果传递到 Format-table cmdlet 来设置结果的格式为包含名称和版本作为列标题的表。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Get properties of a module
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 获取模块的属性

trans-unit.source: This command gets the properties of the **PSModuleInfo** object that **Get-Module** returns.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取的属性 **PSModuleInfo** 对象 **Get-module** 返回。

trans-unit.source: There is one object for each module file.
trans-unit.target: 每个模块文件都有一个对应对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties to format and filter the module objects.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用属性来对模块对象进行格式设置和筛选。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the properties, see PSModule Propertieshttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143624 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143624) in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关属性的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中的 PSModule Propertieshttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143624 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143624)。

trans-unit.source: The output includes the new properties, such as **Author** and **CompanyName**, that were introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 输出包括新的属性，如 **作者** 和 **CompanyName**, ，Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Group all modules by name
trans-unit.target: 示例 6︰ 按名称分组的所有模块

trans-unit.source: This command gets all module files, both imported and available, and then groups them by module name.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取所有模块文件导入和可用，然后按模块名称对其进行分组。

trans-unit.source: This lets you see the module files that each script is exporting.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够查看每个脚本将要导出的模块文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Display the contents of a module manifest
trans-unit.target: 示例 7︰ 显示模块清单中的内容

trans-unit.source: These commands display the contents of the module manifest for the Windows PowerShell**BitsTransfer** module.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令将显示 Windows PowerShell 模块清单中的内容**BitsTransfer** 模块。

trans-unit.source: Modules are not required to have manifest files.
trans-unit.target: 模块不需要具有清单文件。

trans-unit.source: When they do have a manifest file, the manifest file is required only to include a version number.
trans-unit.target: 当它们具有清单文件时，该清单文件是只需包含版本号。

trans-unit.source: However, manifest files often provide useful information about a module, its requirements, and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 但是，清单文件通常可提供有关模块、模块要求和模块内容的有用信息。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: List files in module directory
trans-unit.target: 示例 8︰ 列出模块目录中的文件

trans-unit.source: This command lists the files in the directory of the module.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将列出的模块目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: This is another way to determine what is in a module before you import it.
trans-unit.target: 这是另一种用于在导入模块之前确定模块中的内容的方法。

trans-unit.source: Some modules might have help files or ReadMe files that describe the module.
trans-unit.target: 某些模块可能具有帮助文件或描述该模板的自述文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Get modules installed on a computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 9︰ 获取计算机上安装的模块

trans-unit.source: These commands get the modules that are installed on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令将获取安装在 Server01 计算机上的模块。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **New-PSSession** cmdlet to create a **PSSession** on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 **New-pssession** cmdlet 来创建 **PSSession** Server01 计算机上。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the **PSSession** in the $s variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将保存 **PSSession** $s 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the *PSSession* and *ListAvailable* parameters of **Get-Module** to get the modules in the **PSSession** in the $s variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 *PSSession* 和 *ListAvailable* 参数 **Get-module** 获取模块 **PSSession** $s 变量中。

trans-unit.source: If you pipe modules from other sessions to the **Import-Module** cmdlet, **Import-Module** imports the module into the current session by using the implicit remoting feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果你通过管道将模块从其他会话 **导入模块** cmdlet， **导入模块** 将模块导入当前会话，通过使用隐式远程处理功能。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to using the **Import-PSSession** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于使用 **Import-pssession** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can use the cmdlets from the module in the current session, but commands that use these cmdlets actually run the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 可以在当前会话中使用模块中的 cmdlet，但使用这些 cmdlet 的命令实际在远程会话中运行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see **Import-Module** and **Import-PSSession**.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 **导入模块** 和 **Import-pssession**。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Manage a computer that does not run the Windows operating system
trans-unit.target: 示例 10︰ 管理未运行 Windows 操作系统的计算机

trans-unit.source: The commands in this example enable you to manage the storage systems of a remote computer that is not running the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中的命令使您能够管理未运行 Windows 操作系统的远程计算机的存储系统。

trans-unit.source: In this example, because the administrator of the computer has installed the Module Discovery WMI provider, the CIM commands can use the default values, which are designed for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，由于计算机的管理员已安装模块发现 WMI 提供程序，因此 CIM 命令可以使用专门用于该提供程序的默认值。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -All
trans-unit.target: -全部

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets all modules in each module folder, including nested modules, manifest (.psd1) files, script module (.psm1) files, and binary module (.dll) files.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将在每个模块文件夹，包括嵌套的模块、 清单 (.psd1) 文件、 脚本模块 (.psm1) 文件和二进制模块 (.dll) 文件中获取所有模块。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, **Get-Module** gets only the default module in each module folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此参数， **Get-module** 获取每个模块文件夹中的只有默认模块。

trans-unit.source: -CimNamespace
trans-unit.target: -CimNamespace

trans-unit.source: Specifies the namespace of an alternate CIM provider that exposes CIM modules.
trans-unit.target: 指定可公开 CIM 模块的备用 CIM 提供程序的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the namespace of the Module Discovery WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是模块发现 WMI 提供程序的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter to get CIM modules from computers and devices that are not running the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数的计算机和未运行 Windows 操作系统的设备获取 CIM 模块。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -CimResourceUri
trans-unit.target: -CimResourceUri

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternate location for CIM modules.
trans-unit.target: 指定 CIM 模块的备用位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the resource URI of the Module Discovery WMI provider on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为资源的远程计算机上模块发现 WMI 提供程序的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter to get CIM modules from computers and devices that are not running the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数的计算机和未运行 Windows 操作系统的设备获取 CIM 模块。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -CimSession
trans-unit.target: -CimSession

trans-unit.source: Specifies a CIM session on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定远程计算机上的 CIM 会话。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the CIM session or a command that gets the CIM session, such as a Get-CIMSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227966 command.
trans-unit.target: 输入包含 CIM 会话或可获取 CIM 会话，如 Get CIMSessionhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227966 命令的命令的变量。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Module** uses the CIM session connection to get modules from the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** 使用 CIM 会话连接从远程计算机获取模块。

trans-unit.source: When you import the module by using the **Import-Module** cmdlet and use the commands from the imported module in the current session, the commands actually run on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用导入该模块 **导入模块** cmdlet 并在当前会话中使用导入的模块中的命令，命令实际上在远程计算机上运行。

trans-unit.source: You can use this parameter to get modules from computers and devices that are not running the Windows operating system, and computers that have Windows PowerShell, but do not have Windows PowerShell remoting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可用于的计算机以及未运行 Windows 操作系统的设备和计算机︰ 具有 Windows PowerShell，但不是具备启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理获取模块。

trans-unit.source: The *CimSession* parameter gets all modules in the **CIMSession**.
trans-unit.target: *CimSession* 参数获取所有模块 **CIMSession**。

trans-unit.source: However, you can import only CIM-based and Cmdlet Definition XML (CDXML)-based modules.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你只能导入基于 CIM 和基于 Cmdlet 定义 XML (CDXML) 的模块。

trans-unit.source: -FullyQualifiedName
trans-unit.target: -FullyQualifiedName

trans-unit.source: Specifies names of modules in the form of **ModuleSpecification** objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定的模块名称的形式 **ModuleSpecification** 对象。

trans-unit.source: These objects are described in the Remarks section of ModuleSpecification Constructor (Hashtable)http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290(v=vs.85).aspx (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290(v=vs.85).aspx) in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library.
trans-unit.target: 在 ModuleSpecification Constructor (Hashtable) http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290 (v=vs.85).aspx (Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 库中 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290 (v=vs.85).aspx) 备注部分中介绍这些对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the *FullyQualifiedName* parameter accepts a module name that is specified in the following formats:
trans-unit.target: 例如， *FullyQualifiedName* 参数接受采用以下格式指定的模块名称︰

trans-unit.source: @{ModuleName = "modulename"; ModuleVersion = "version_number"} @{ModuleName = "modulename"; ModuleVersion = "version_number"; Guid = "GUID"}.
trans-unit.target: @{ModuleName ="modulename";ModuleVersion ="version_number"} @{ModuleName ="modulename";ModuleVersion ="version_number";Guid ="GUID"}。

trans-unit.source: **ModuleName** and **ModuleVersion** are required, but **Guid** is optional.
trans-unit.target: **ModuleName** 和 **ModuleVersion** 是必需的但 **Guid** 是可选的。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify the *FullyQualifiedName* parameter in the same command as a *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定 *FullyQualifiedName* 中为相同的命令参数 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: -ListAvailable
trans-unit.target: -ListAvailable

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets all installed modules.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将获取所有已安装的模块。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Module** gets modules in paths listed in the **PSModulePath** environment variable.
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** 中列出的路径中获取模块 **PSModulePath** 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, **Get-Module** gets only the modules that are both listed in the **PSModulePath** environment variable, and that are loaded in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此参数， **Get-module** 存在以下两种模块中列出的获取 **PSModulePath** 环境变量，并且在当前会话中加载。

trans-unit.source: *ListAvailable* does not return information about modules that are not found in the **PSModulePath** environment variable, even if those modules are loaded in the current session.
trans-unit.target: *ListAvailable* 不返回有关模块中找不到的信息 **PSModulePath** 环境变量，即使在当前会话中加载这些模块。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies names or name patterns of modules that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 指定名称或名称模式，此 cmdlet 将获取的模块。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe the names to **Get-Module**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道名称以适应 **Get-module**。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify the *FullyQualifiedName* parameter in the same command as a *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定 *FullyQualifiedName* 中为相同的命令参数 *名称* 参数。

trans-unit.source: *Name* cannot accept a module GUID as a value.
trans-unit.target: *名称* 不能接受模块 GUID，则为一个值。

trans-unit.source: To return modules by specifying a GUID, use *FullyQualifiedName* instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过指定 GUID 返回模块，请使用 *FullyQualifiedName* 相反。

trans-unit.source: -PSSession
trans-unit.target: -PSSession

trans-unit.source: Gets the modules in the specified user-managed Windows PowerShell session (**PSSession**).
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的用户托管的 Windows PowerShell 会话中的模块 (**PSSession**)。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the session, a command that gets the session, such as a Get-PSSession command, or a command that creates the session, such as a New-PSSession command.
trans-unit.target: 输入包含会话、 获取会话，例如 Get-pssession 命令的命令或创建该会话，例如 New-pssession 命令的命令的变量。

trans-unit.source: When the session is connected to a remote computer, you must specify the *ListAvailable* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当会话连接到远程计算机时，您必须指定 *ListAvailable* 参数。

trans-unit.source: A **Get-Module** command that uses the *PSSession* parameter is equivalent to using the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a `Get-Module -ListAvailable` command in a **PSSession**.
trans-unit.target: 一个 **Get-module** 使用的命令 *PSSession* 参数等效于使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 运行 `Get-Module -ListAvailable` 命令 **PSSession**。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Refresh
trans-unit.target: 刷新

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet refreshes the cache of installed commands.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 刷新缓存的已安装的命令。

trans-unit.source: The command cache is created when the session starts.
trans-unit.target: 命令缓存是在会话启动时创建的。

trans-unit.source: It enables the Get-Command cmdlet to get commands from modules that are not imported into the session.
trans-unit.target: 它使 Get-command cmdlet 来获取命令不导入会话的模块中。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is designed for development and testing scenarios in which the contents of modules have changed since the session started.
trans-unit.target: 此参数旨在用于开发和测试方案，在这些方案中，模块的内容自会话启动后已发生更改。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the *Refresh* parameter in a command, you must specify *ListAvailable*.
trans-unit.target: 当您指定 *刷新* 命令中的参数，必须指定 *ListAvailable*。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe module names to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递给此 cmdlet 的模块名称。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns objects that represent modules.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将返回表示模块的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the *ListAvailable* parameter, **Get-Module** returns a **ModuleInfoGrouping** object, which is a type of **PSModuleInfo** object that has the same properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: 当您指定 *ListAvailable* 参数， **Get-module** 返回 **ModuleInfoGrouping** 对象，它是一种类型的 **PSModuleInfo** 具有相同的属性和方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, the core commands that are included in Windows PowerShell are packaged in modules.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，将 Windows PowerShell 中包含的核心命令打包在模块中。

trans-unit.source: The exception is **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core**, which is a snap-in (**PSSnapin**).
trans-unit.target: 例外情况是 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core**, ，这是管理单元 (**PSSnapin**)。

trans-unit.source: By default, only the **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core** snap-in is added to the session.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core** 添加到会话的管理单元中。

trans-unit.source: Modules are imported automatically on first use and you can use the **Import-Module** cmdlet to import them.
trans-unit.target: 模块自动导入在首次使用，并且你可以使用 **导入模块** cmdlet 可将其导入。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, the core commands that are installed with Windows PowerShell are packaged in modules.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，随 Windows PowerShell 安装核心命令已打包在模块中。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, and in host programs that create older-style sessions in later versions of Windows PowerShell, the core commands are packaged in snap-ins (**PSSnapins**).
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，并在更高版本的 Windows PowerShell 中创建旧样式会话的主机程序中，核心命令打包到管理单元 (**Pssnapin**)。

trans-unit.source: The exception is **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core**, which is always a snap-in.
trans-unit.target: 例外情况是 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Core**, ，这始终是管理单元。

trans-unit.source: Also, remote sessions, such as those started by the **New-PSSession** cmdlet, are older-style sessions that include core snap-ins.
trans-unit.target: 此外，远程会话，例如那些由启动 **New-pssession** cmdlet，包括核心管理单元的旧样式会话。

trans-unit.source: For information about the **CreateDefault2** method that creates newer-style sessions with core modules, see CreateDefault2 Methodhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.runspaces.initialsessionstate.createdefault2(v=VS.85).aspx (http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.runspaces.initialsessionstate.createdefault2(v=VS.85).aspx) in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 璝惠 **CreateDefault2** 使用核心模块创建较新样式会话的方法，请参阅 CreateDefault2 Methodhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.runspaces.initialsessionstate.createdefault2 (v=VS.85).aspx (MSDN 库中的 http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.runspaces.initialsessionstate.createdefault2 (v=VS.85).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Module** gets only modules in locations that are stored in the value of the **PSModulePath** environment variable ($env:PSModulePath).
trans-unit.target: **Get-module** 只获取模块中的值中存储的位置 **PSModulePath** 环境变量 ($env: PSModulePath)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *Path* parameter of the **Import-Module** cmdlet to import modules in other locations, but you cannot use the **Get-Module** cmdlet to get them.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *路径* 参数 **导入模块** cmdlet 导入的模块中其他位置，但是您不能使用 **Get-module** cmdlet 来获取它们。

trans-unit.source: Also, starting in Windows PowerShell 3.0, new properties have been added to the object that **Get-Module** returns that make it easier to learn about modules even before they are imported.
trans-unit.target: 此外，从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，新的属性具有已添加到对象的 **Get-module** 更加轻松地了解模块，即使它们被导入之前返回。

trans-unit.source: All properties are populated before importing.
trans-unit.target: 在导入之前填充所有属性。

trans-unit.source: These include the **ExportedCommands**, **ExportedCmdlets** and **ExportedFunctions** properties that list the commands that the module exports.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括 **ExportedCommands**, ，**ExportedCmdlets** 和 **ExportedFunctions** 列出模块导出的命令的属性。

trans-unit.source: The *ListAvailable* parameter gets only well-formed modules, that is, folders that contain at least one file whose base name is the same as the name of the module folder.
trans-unit.target: *ListAvailable* 参数只获取格式正确的模块，即，包含其基名称是模块文件夹同名的至少一个文件的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The base name is the name without the file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 基名称是不带文件扩展名的名称。

trans-unit.source: Folders that contain files that have different names are considered to be containers, but not modules.
trans-unit.target: 包含具有不同的名称的文件的文件夹视为容器，而不是模块。

trans-unit.source: To get modules that are implemented as .dll files, but are not enclosed in a module folder, specify both the *ListAvailable* and *All* parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作为.dll 文件，而实现，但没有包含在模块文件夹的模块，可以同时指定 *ListAvailable* 和 *所有* 参数。

trans-unit.source: To use the CIM session feature, the remote computer must have WS-Management remoting and Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI), which is the Microsoft implementation of the Common Information Model (CIM) standard.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 CIM 会话功能，远程计算机必须具有 WS-Management 远程处理和 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)，后者是通用信息模型 (CIM) 标准的 Microsoft 实现。

trans-unit.source: The computer must also have the Module Discovery WMI provider or an alternate WMI provider that has the same basic features.
trans-unit.target: 计算机必须还具有模块发现 WMI 提供程序或具有相同基本功能的备用 WMI 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: You can use the CIM session feature on computers that are not running the Windows operating system and on Windows computers that have Windows PowerShell, but do not have Windows PowerShell remoting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CIM 会话功能，以及具有 Windows PowerShell，但却没有启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理的 Windows 计算机上未运行 Windows 操作系统的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the CIM parameters to get CIM modules from computers that have Windows PowerShell remoting enabled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CIM 参数从已启用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理的计算机获取 CIM 模块。

trans-unit.source: This includes the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 这包括本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: When you create a CIM session on the local computer, Windows PowerShell uses DCOM, instead of WMI, to create the session.
trans-unit.target: 在本地计算机上创建 CIM 会话时，Windows PowerShell 使用 DCOM，而不是 WMI 来创建会话。
